scripts.test: npx playwright test --project=react && npx playwright test --project=vue
scripts.test:unit: cd react && npm run test && cd ../vue && npm run test:unit
scripts.typecheck: cd react && npm run typecheck && cd ../vue && npm run typecheck

scripts.dev: (cd react && npm run dev &) && (cd vue && npm run dev &) && wait
